articles.title: Gujarat | Chandipura virus claims 16 lives, 50 cases reported: Health ministry - WION
articles.description: Gujarat | Chandipura virus claims 16 lives, 50 cases reported: Health ministry
articles.content: The state has reported 50 cases and 16 deaths, with the virus spilling over into other states as 3 cases have been found in patients from outside Gujarat.

articles.title: Bangladesh Cops Given Shoot-On-Sight Orders Amid Curfew To Quell Student Protests - NDTV
articles.description: Soldiers patrolled the streets of Bangladesh to quell growing civil unrest sparked by student demonstrations, with the police being granted "shoot-on-sight" orders for those defying curfew.
articles.content: <li>This week's violence has killed at least 133 people so far, posing a monumental challenge to Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina's autocratic government after 15 years in office. Ms Hasina had been due … [+1991 chars]

articles.description: Donald Trump held his first campaign event on Saturday after the last week's assassination attempt and said that the shooting against him was an act of sacrifice.
